New Records: Alperen Sengun had 25 points and 14 rebounds, but no new records were broken
Key Match Events: A soaring, two-handed dunk by Amen Thompson followed by a 3 from Jalen Green made it 105-97 with less than a minute to go.
The Rockets led by 15 points early before the Knicks got within one late in the fourth quarter.
Pre-Game Insights: No pre-game insights were mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: The Rockets need to find a way to be more consistent throughout games.
The Knicks need to do a better job of scoring inside with Karl-Anthony Towns.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockets won despite making just 8 of 33 3-pointers.
The Knicks were outscored 62-38 in the paint.
Others: The Rockets host the Spurs on Wednesday night.
The Knicks visit the Hawks on Wednesday night.
